document_data.name: Archelon Ischyras
document_data.mainbody: '''Archelon ischyras''' ({{Pronounce|AR|ka|lon|_|SHY|rus|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|25}}}}), also known as '''archelon''', was a species of large marine turtle. Archelons were technically not [[dinosaur]]s.
document_data.Description: Archelons were large turtles, with a massive shell. Their shell was a leathery shell instead of a hard shell. It was thick and formed in plates. Archelons had a pair of large, powerful flippers.
document_data.Combat: Their thick and strong shell provided archelons with amble defence against predators.
document_data.Habitat: Archelons were found in oceans, spending most of their time in the water.
document_data.Biology: Archelons were carnivores and were solitary creatures.
